text: Petre Roman (; born 22 July 1946) is a Romanian engineer and politician. He was Prime Minister of Romania from 1989 to 1991. He was also the president of the Senate from 1996 to 1999 and Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1999 to 2000. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Romania Category:Presidents of the Senate of Romania
title: Petre Roman
